text: Zakaria Ben Mustapha (7 July 1925 - 4 June 2019) was a Tunisian politician. He was born in Tunis. Mustapha was the Mayor of Tunis from 1980 to 1986. Before, he was Governor of Gabès from 1967 to 1969. He was the Minister of Culture from 1986 1988. He was a member of the Socialist Destourian Party and of the Democratic Constitutional Rally. He was an ally of President Habib Bourguiba. Mustapha died in Tunis on 4 June 2019 at the age of 93.Ancien ministre de la Culture et maire de Tunis, le chef scout Zakaria Ben Mustapha est décédé ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Tunis Category:Mayors
title: Zakaria Ben Mustapha
